ModMetaData.name: [NEO] RimNauts
ModMetaData.author: nolabritt, RadZerp, Sophist88
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Near Earth Objects (NEO) like moons, asteroids and space debris. Everything is visable and animated in an orbit on the world map. The moon is a playable biome which you need to discover and travel to using a rocket.
Known issues - There's a bug that causes the moon to disappear when the camera moves(not zooming) far enough away from it.
- THIS MOD REQUIRES A NEW SAVE TO SEE THE MOON
Credits - Art: Kasmex and Genome-X
